description: The DescribeFlowSourceMetadata API is used to view information about the flow's source transport stream and programs. This API displays status messages about the flow's source as well as details about the program's video, audio, and other data.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that DescribeFlowSourceMetadata was performed on.

nested_items.name: Messages
nested_items.description: Provides a status code and message regarding issues found with the flow source metadata.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The specific error message that MediaConnect returns to help you understand the reason that the request did not succeed.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the most recent change in metadata for this flow's source.

nested_items.name: TransportMediaInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the flow's transport media.

nested_items.name: Programs
nested_items.description: The list of transport stream programs in the current flow's source.

nested_items.name: PcrPid
nested_items.description: The Program Clock Reference (PCR) Packet ID (PID) as it is reported in the Program Association Table.

nested_items.name: ProgramName
nested_items.description: The program name as it is reported in the Program Association Table.

nested_items.name: ProgramNumber
nested_items.description: The program number as it is reported in the Program Association Table.

nested_items.name: ProgramPid
nested_items.description: The program Packet ID (PID) as it is reported in the Program Association Table.

nested_items.name: Streams
nested_items.description: The list of elementary transport streams in the program. The list includes video, audio, and data streams.

nested_items.name: Channels
nested_items.description: The number of channels in the audio stream.

nested_items.name: Codec
nested_items.description: The codec used by the stream.

nested_items.name: FrameRate
nested_items.description: The frame rate used by the video stream.

nested_items.name: FrameResolution
nested_items.description: The frame resolution used by the video stream.

nested_items.name: FrameHeight
nested_items.description: The number of pixels in the height of the video frame.

nested_items.name: FrameWidth
nested_items.description: The number of pixels in the width of the video frame.

nested_items.name: Pid
nested_items.description: The Packet ID (PID) as it is reported in the Program Map Table.

nested_items.name: SampleRate
nested_items.description: The sample rate used by the audio stream.

nested_items.name: SampleSize
nested_items.description: The sample bit size used by the audio stream.

nested_items.name: StreamType
nested_items.description: The Stream Type as it is reported in the Program Map Table.
